summoned with #1132 Call Ladon (Conjuration 6)

Ladon, the Hesperian Dragon, is the eternal guardian of the golden apples of immortality. It is a huge many-headed serpent with scales as hard as iron. Its fangs are deadly and its body regenerates wounds.
